text: Hi there how are you doing today?
I am doing great, how are you?
I am doing really great today as well. How is the weather where you are?
It is beautiful here today. I have recently gotten involved in a charity for children. This charity helps under priveledge kids.
Yes, that sounds wonderful! Have you worked with this charity before, or no?

No I haven't this is a new experience for me. I am learning quickly the importance of it and one dollar. Just one dollar can make a difference to these kids. Would this be something you would be willing to donate to?
I will donate if you will. Are you also willing to give up part of your payment as well? If so, then you can count me in for $1.
I a absolutely am willing to give up my payment. These actions we take make all the difference to these kids. Thank you for your donation!
Okay. Sounds good. What is the exact amount you are willing to give?
I will give a dollar. What amount are you willing to give?
I am also willing to give $1. What are you hoping your donation helps with?
I am hoping this donation helps with feeding these children.
You are absolutely reading my mind. Hey, I forgot to ask what else you are up to today?
I am just enjoying the weather, what are you up to today?
I am trying to get organized today. It is rainy here today so it seems like a good time. I am also going to look at the Save the Children site. Have you looked at it at all?.
I have not been to the website yet, that sounds like something I need to do.
You should look into it. Have you seen all of the news coverage about the storm in Hawaii?
I haven't watched the news much lately, but I have heard a little bit about it. Weather can be crazy!
Well, it looks like this charity is already willing to help Hawaii out. I am really glad they are helping right away. How do you feel?
That is wonderful news! I am glad they are helping immediately as well. I believe this charity will do great things!
